title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Chiefs narrow win over the Giants on Monday Night Football and why it's time to admit Kansas City is no longer an elite team in the NFL. He doubles down on his analysis of Odell Beckham Jr and advocates for the Browns to trade the super star wide receiver leading up to the trade deadline. He reveals his Herd Hierarchy after week 8 in the NFL. Plus, former NFL QB and Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to tell Colin what's wrong with Mahomes and the Chiefs offense plus a potential QB controversy in New York?!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
